an9.22:1.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakhalunke desessami tayo ca purisakhalunke tayo ca assaparasse tayo ca purisaparasse tayo ca bhadde assajaniye tayo ca bhadde purisajaniye.
an9.22:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno hoti, na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:2.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:2.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti, na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:3.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:3.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti, na vannasampanno na arohaparinahasampanno?
an9.22:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an9.22:4.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho samsadeti, no vissajjeti.
an9.22:4.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno hoti, na vannasampanno na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno?
an9.22:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an9.22:5.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an9.22:5.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an9.22:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an9.22:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an9.22:6.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an9.22:6.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisakhalunko javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:7.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:8.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:9.2: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an9.22:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti, tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an9.22:9.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an9.22:9.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:10.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadda assajaniya?
an9.22:10.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:10.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadda assajaniya.
an9.22:11.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadda purisajaniya?
an9.22:11.3: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:12.2: javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an9.22:12.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an9.22:12.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an9.22:12.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhaddo purisajaniyo javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an9.22:12.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadda purisajaniya”ti.
